short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an icon to your address bar that allows you to go straight to the HornTracker data viewer with relevant parameters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For MouseHunt players: Want to know the mice population for your location? Want to know how your current setup should be doing?

1.1.1:
- Inclusion of newest traps and charms
